Title: Provides that where the commissioner of health assumes the responsibility for the transportation of medicaid recipients in rural areas, existing public transportation systems shall be used
Summary: Provides that where the commissioner of health assumes the responsibility for the transportation of medicaid recipients in rural areas, existing public transportation systems shall be used when such systems are appropriate, available and the least expensive modes of transportation.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-h, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the transportation of eligible persons residing in a rural area
